nodes.documentation:
@title Streamr Marketplace
@dev note about numbers:
  All prices and exchange rates are in "decimal fixed-point", that is, scaled by 10^18, like ETH vs wei.
 Seconds are integers as usual.
 * Next version TODO:
 1. Bancor integration
 - EIP-165 inferface definition; PurchaseListener
 - struct creation should use named arguments: Product({id: id, ... })
 - buyFor: buy could specify who gets to subscription (without transferSubscription)
 - grantSubscription: product owner could give a subscription to X
nodes.name: Marketplace20180425

nodes.documentation: Stop offering the product
nodes.name: deleteProduct

nodes.documentation: Return product to market
nodes.name: redeployProduct

nodes.documentation: Changes ownership of the product. Two phase hand-over minimizes the chance that the product ownership is lost to a non-existent address.
nodes.name: offerProductOwnership

nodes.documentation: Changes ownership of the product. Two phase hand-over minimizes the chance that the product ownership is lost to a non-existent address.
nodes.name: claimProductOwnership

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes32,address) view returns (struct Marketplace20180425.Product storage pointer,struct Marketplace20180425.TimeBasedSubscription storage pointer)
tuple(struct Marketplace20180425.Product storage pointer,struct Marketplace20180425.TimeBasedSubscription storage pointer)
function (struct Marketplace20180425.TimeBasedSubscription storage pointer) view returns (bool)

nodes.documentation: Checks if the given address currently has a valid subscription
nodes.name: hasValidSubscription

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes32,address) view returns (struct Marketplace20180425.Product storage pointer,struct Marketplace20180425.TimeBasedSubscription storage pointer)

nodes.documentation:
Transfer a valid subscription from msg.sender to a new address.
If the address already has a valid subscription, extends the subscription by the msg.sender's remaining period.
nodes.name: transferSubscription
updateExchangeRates
getPriceInData

nodes.documentation: //////////// Admin functionality ///////////////
nodes.name: Halted
